data.actual_result: No warning, all messages from the blocked user are shown
data.expected_result: A warning message saying "We've hidden x results from users you have blocked" like on the desktop version
data.short_description: No warning when searching for messages from a blocked user
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to someone's profile and block them - Go to a server that you know they have sent messages in and search for messages from them - Notice that there's no warning displayed and that all messages are shown
